articles.title: PhonePe lets users make payments on its UPI platform internationally - Economic Times
articles.description: The current launch supports international countries in which UPI has been launched including United Arab Emirates (UAE), Singapore, Mauritius, Nepal and Bhutan
articles.content: Digital payments firm PhonePe said on Tuesday that it had launched support for 'UPI international' payments, allowing users to pay foreign merchants using the Unified Payments Interface (UPI) infrast… [+2128 chars]
